title: Inception
plot: A skilled thief uses dream-sharing technology to perform corporate espionage and is given a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can implant another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Prestige
plot: Two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate stage illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: Tenet
plot: An operative manipulates the flow of time to prevent World War III.
